amendment.description: To limit the obligation and expenditure of funds for the Ground-based Midcourse Defense program pending the submission of a report on operational test and evaluation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3353 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 139.

action.text: Amendment SA 3353 proposed by Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S7037, S7038-7040, S7041-7042; text: CR S7037) To limit the obligation and expenditure of funds for the Ground-based Midcourse Defense program pending the submission of a report on operational test and evaluation.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3353 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 139.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3353 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 139.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3353 proposed by Senator Reed.
